text: After the Wedding () is a 1962 Soviet drama film directed by Mikhail Yershov.Даниил Гранин. БиографияДаниилу Гранину исполнилось 95 лет == Plot == A young guy from Leningrad is getting married and after the wedding he goes on duty to the village. After some time he is allowed to return, but he decides to stay in the village, because he understands that the collective farm needs him.После свадьбы == Cast == * Stanislav Khitrov as Igor Malyutin * Natalya Kustinskaya as Tonya Malyutina * Aleftina Konstantinova as Vera * Leonard Borisevich as Aleksey Ivanovich Ippolitov * Pavel Kashlakov as Genka * Yury Solovyov as Semyon * Georgy Satini as Yuriy Pavlovich Pisarev * Vera Titova as Nadezhda Osipovna * Yevgeniy Teterin as Vitaliy Fadeyevich Chernyshyov * YeBoris Kokovkin as KislovПосле свадьбы (1963) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1962 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: After the Wedding (1962 film)
